description: This file defines the PollListFragment class, which is a UI fragment responsible for displaying a list of polls in an Android application. It manages view initialization, fetches poll data asynchronously from a backend service, and handles user interactions such as clicking on a poll to view its details.

classes.name: PollListFragment
classes.description: A fragment that presents a list of poll items, handles data fetching and user interactions.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the layout for the fragment, initializes RecyclerView and ProgressBar, initiates fetching polls.

methods.name: fetchPolls
methods.description: Retrieves the list of polls from the backend service asynchronously and updates the UI accordingly.

methods.name: onPollClick
methods.description: Handles click events on a poll item by launching the detail activity for the selected poll.
